verbose_text: The central molecule is the heat shock factor 1 (HSF1), which is activated by environmental stress XREF_BIBR and binds as a trimeric transcription factor to heat shock elements (HSE) in the promoters of several downstream genes, such as the chaperones Hsp70 and Hsp90 XREF_BIBR.
